## Matrix4.rotateX() method

Rotates the current matrix by an angle in radians around the x-axis.

**Signature:**

```typescript
rotateX(angle: number): Matrix4;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description

angle


</td><td>

number

The angle in radians to rotate the current matrix by.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**
